title: Google Search Gadget for Windows Vista Sidebar
description:
A basic search gadget for your sidebar, should work on XP as well. It&#039;s unintruding, opens Google search results on your default browser and thats it. No other popups, scams or annoyances.
I&#039;ve got a Torrent, Search and Crack gadget over hereIt works really well, and as you can see, nobody&#039;s posted about malicious activity from my gadgets.

I am seeding, even if the site says there aren&#039;t any seeds.

If it doesn&#039;t automatically install:
1.Simply copy ?%userprofile%AppDataLocalMicrosoftWindowsSidebarGadgets? and paste in Windows explorer address bar.

2. When you get to that folder Copy and Paste the ?Google.Gadget? folder there.

3. Add it to the sidebar from your sidebar gallery.

As always, enjoy and checkout http://www.yourdealing.com/vistagadgets/ for updates and othe Vista Sidebar Gadgets.
Cheers!
